snippet: With a first-quarter dunk, LeBron James became the fifth N.B.A. player to score 10 or more points in 500 consecutive games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat beat Toronto Raptors, 104-95, as LeBron James scores season-high 35 points; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: With a first-quarter dunk, LeBron James became the fifth N.B.A. player to score 10 or more points in 500 consecutive games.

headline.main: In Win, James and Heat Achieve Milestone in Style
headline.print_headline: In Win, James and Heat Achieve Milestone in Style
